name: nlpcloud
description:
Node.js client for the NLP Cloud API. NLP Cloud serves high performance pre-trained and custom models for NER, sentiment-analysis, classification, summarization, question answering, and POS tagging, ready for production, served through a REST API.

More details here: https://nlpcloud.io

Documentation: https://docs.nlpcloud.io
author: Julien Salinas
